ygData.subject: Re: I'd liketo be removed andi'm anideit
ygData.msgSnippet: My gawd...! YOU registered. If you don t remember registering...well...take Altzheimers medication! Go to www.onelist.com and search for EQtinkering . Remove
ygData.messageBody:
My gawd...! YOU registered. If you don't remember registering...well...take
Altzheimers medication! Go to www.onelist.com and search for "EQtinkering".
Remove yourselves!! If you can't remember your password, you're screwed for
life. Delete that email. It's your fault! Stop spamming the list with I would
like to be removed crap, it's SO annoying. WE CAN'T REMOVE YOU!!
Thank you, thank you very much.
